author: benh
msg: Need to incldue string.h on Linux.

author: benh
msg: Made the configure option --with-included-zookeeper imply the option --with-zookeeper.

author: benh
msg: Updated a comment and corrected some formating.

author: benh
msg: Enabled building Mesos completely without ZooKeeper support. To build with ZooKeeper support you need to specify --with-zookeeper. In addition, to build the included ZooKeeper (and use it for linking) you need to specify --with-included-zookeeper.
